name: DEATH TEARS
description:
( htpps://hail the portrait pazta series/deportapazta)
this is my (nft) series of digital portraits of characters from my comic book that I created in mid 2015.

TIARA (tears) is one of the characters in my comic books, she's a woman who have ability to shoot on target with any weapons among the other women in the group and she's a cloning female warrior who has an angel "tears" a death tears also slightly modified her body into a hybrid-machine warrior to be strong in the battle

_____________
animated mp4/gif format 1080x1080 px 2021
background music by me (deathpazta)
deathpazta-versesloner.mp3
319kbps 2 stereo 48.000 khz 

This series will contain nine portraits of characters who are members of the gang called "PAZTA-GANG" in my comic book. This series is on going project because I will reintroduce my comic story that has been asleep for a long time.

Stay tuned! Keep the fire up! Enjoy the series!
